response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its high worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you can acquire this exceptional product for $14,000. This offer represents an excellent opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive price. I look forward to discussing the details with you and helping your business reach new heights.", "product_price": 14000}
